location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Shirauz [Shiraz], to Captain Charles Sealy, Commander of the HC Cruizer Ternateand Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a letter (not present) from the Chief Secretary to the Government, which modifies the instructions guiding how officers in command of cruizers are to interact with vessels suspected of being engaged in piracy.
